verse: चेतनस्तुद्विधा प्रोक्तो जीव आत्मेति च प्रभो। जीवाब्रह्मादयः प्रोक्ता आत्मैकस्तु जनार्दनः ॥

terms.जनार्दनः: O Janardana (another name for Lord Krishna, the sustainer and protector of all living beings)

meaning: Meaning:O Lord, consciousness is said to exist in two ways. The individual soul (jiva) and the self (atma) are both described as consciousness. The jivas, starting from Brahma, are considered to be the self. However, O Janardana, the self is ultimately one.
